css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-240c622d-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);max-width:1170px;min-width:initial;padding-bottom:60px;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-240c622d-u{max-width:1690px;padding-bottom:80px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-240c622d-u{max-width:90%;padding-bottom:40px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-240c622d-u{padding-bottom:30px;}}
